name: Chicken Spaghetti
ingredients: 1 lb. spaghetti 1 can milder Rotel Diced Tomatoes with Green Chilies
2 tsp. garlic powder 1 15 oz. jar of original Cheez Whiz
steps: Bake or broil chicken breasts until tender and then dice meat into chunks. Set chicken in fridge until later.
Boil spaghetti in water in a very large pot until tender. Drain off the water from the spaghetti reserving 2 ½
cups of this liquid in a container. Put cooked spaghetti, 2 ½ cups reserved water, bouillon, and garlic back
in pot. Cook and stir on medium low heat until bouillon is dissolved. Add Cheez Whiz and stir until melted
and distributed evenly over spaghetti. Add chicken chunks and tomatoes with juice. Stir over heat and add
pepper to taste. Serve with Parmesan cheese sprinkled on top.
